name: WOODYWOOD-CLICKER(Beta)
description: Have you ever dream to become a lumberman. or maybe you just like to click on thing ? Well this game is made for you! and... all the other people who have nothing else to do... Warning even with out good art & graphics this game can be really addictive ! This game all started in a dream like a revelation... Than i started programming it and there we are. I hope you will like it and maybe support the project or just leave a comment that would be great :)
